lessonSubtitleText: Test how well you know this story

answers: A godly man who did what God said was right
An evil man who did whatever he wanted
A soldier who fought in many battles
A prophet who traveled from city to city

questions.text: What is the first thing Satan said to God?
answers: If you take away your blessing from Job, he’ll curse you!
Job is the greatest man on earth.
Let me bless Job even more.
Job will always obey you no matter what.

questions.text: What happened to Job’s children, animals, and servants?
answers: They died or were stolen
They ran away and never returned
They were taken as prisoners to another land
They got chicken pox

questions.text: After losing his children, animals, and servants, did Job curse God?
answers: No
Yes
He stayed silent for the rest of his life
He blamed his friends

questions.text: What is the second thing Satan said to God?
answers: Take away Job’s health and he’ll curse you.
Give Job more blessings and he will forget you.
Send Job far away from his home.
Let Job become rich and powerful.

questions.text: What did Satan do to Job’s body? Did Job curse God?
answers: Covered him with sores; he did not curse God
Made him blind; he cursed God immediately
Broke his bones; Job ran away from God
Made him unable to speak; Job denied God

questions.text: What did Job’s wife tell him to do?
answers: Curse God and die
Pray harder and wait for healing
Leave their home and start over elsewhere
Ask God to forgive his sins

questions.text: What did Job’s friends say to him?
answers: You are suffering because of sin
The devil is attacking you
God is evil
Stop complaining

questions.text: Why did God come and ask Job and his friends so many questions?
answers: To show them he was God and they were not
To punish Job for complaining
To teach Job how to predict the weather
To make them feel dumb

questions.text: What happened at the end of Job’s life?
answers: God blessed him with twice as many servants and animals and ten children
Job wandered the earth alone and poor
Job rebuilt his life without God’s help
God took away everything again to test him
